item.title: Hacking: finding SCADA on Internet using Google Dorks
item.description: It is estimated that Google has stored more pages than any other search engine in the world. With more than billions of pages and a relatively low execution time, the popular Californian search engine manages to satisfy all searches, whether performed for curiosity or for less harmless purposes. It is so powerful that it can categorise over 15 million pages in less than a minute. Moreover, it is assumed that 60+ thousand searches are conducted through Google’s search engine every second.
